title: Music Hell
description: A fever dream comedy and music show featuring up and coming bands and artists. This is Music Hell.
altHero: a CGI, brightly colored tv set with a host who has painted yellow skin and wearing furry blue centaur overalls
alt1: wide shot of the Music Hell set, a colorful fever dream
alt2: a backdrop of a crowd of zombies
alt3: four kids from the band We Are Little Zombies in outrageous outfits
alt4: a green hand holds a giant eyeball and has a pink furry tail
